slides.title: Indian Festivals
slides.content:
**Major Festivals:**

Diwali: Festival of Lights
Holi: Festival of Colors
Dussehra: Victory of good over evil
Eid: Islamic festivals
Christmas: Birth of Jesus
Guru Nanak Jayanti: Sikh festival

**Regional:** Pongal, Onam, Baisakhi, Durga Puja

slides.title: Monuments
slides.content:
**Famous Monuments:**

Taj Mahal: Agra (7 Wonders)
Red Fort: Delhi
Qutub Minar: Delhi
Gateway of India: Mumbai
India Gate: Delhi
Golden Temple: Amritsar
Hawa Mahal: Jaipur

slides.title: Art and Culture
slides.content:
**Classical Dances:** Bharatanatyam, Kathak, Odissi, Kuchipudi
**Music:** Hindustani, Carnatic
**Arts:** Madhubani, Warli, Tanjore paintings
**Crafts:** Silk weaving, Pottery, Handicrafts

question.questionText: In which city is the Taj Mahal located?
question.explanation: The Taj Mahal is located in Agra, Uttar Pradesh. It was built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.
